      • writeVbrTag

        public void writeVbrTag(java.lang.String mp3File)
        Description copied from interface: Encoder
        Writes the VBR tag info to the specified MP3 file.

        VBR tag info property must be enabled (see Lame.lame_set_bWriteVbrTag(lame_global_flags,int)) otherwise does nothing.

        The encoder must be open.

        Specified by:
        writeVbrTag in interface Encoder
        Parameters:
        mp3File - the file path of the MP3 file.
